item.title: Binary Options Trading made Simple with OptionsClick - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Binary Options Trading made Simple with OptionsClick - NEWSBTC

Binary options are an estimate of an asset performance during a given time frame. In most forms of investment, the investors actually purchase the asset they invest in and the value of the profit and loss is determined by the changing value of the asset.
